attributes.action: Debate: the British people demand a referendum on UK membership of the EU
attributes.additional_details:
Since the constitutional legality UK membership of the EU because the Prime minister at the time Edward Heath MP signed the document of accession without a mandate from the electorate by means of a General election of Referendum in 1972, this means that the electorate was disenfranchised by the Government.
We need a new vote on this matter before the EU drags our nation down with its failing economic strategies.
